author: Cambridge Apps

changelog.release_notes:
***1.0.0 2014-01-29 
Initial release.

***1.1.0 2014-03-03 
Tweaked months representation. 

***1.2.0 2014-03-08 
Rebuilt for Pebble 2.0.1. 

***1.3.0 2014-04-16 
Added BT icon (present whenever BT is connected). 
Added battery icon (shows charge level, with + sign when charging). 
Narrowed the horizontal block-markers.

***1.4.0 2014-05-03 
Added vibration when BT lost.

***1.5.0 2014-05-04
Init BT icon properly if BT-off on startup.

description: Shows time & date in analog block format, with 3 time blocks—second, minute, and hour—and 4 date blocks—weekday, day, month, & year.  Each block has 6 columns of 5 dots and denotes 0 when empty. A block fills from bottom to top, left to right, then unfills in same order. Dot below hour is for AM/PM. Dot above year is for 1st/2nd half of century. BT, battery icons. Vibrates hourly and on BT-lost.
